00021 #include "GenericDataHeaderReader.h"
00022 #include "GenericDataHeader.h"
00023 #include "FileInput.h"
00024 #include <sys/stat.h>
00025 #include <sys/types.h>
00026 
00027 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00028 
00029 /*
00030  * Constructor
00031  */
00032 GenericDataHeaderReader::GenericDataHeaderReader(std::ifstream& fs)
00033 : fileStream(fs)
00034 {
00035 }
00036 
00037 /*
00038  * Reads the GenericDataHeader and all parent GenericDataHeaders.
00039  */
00040 void GenericDataHeaderReader::Read(GenericDataHeader& gdh)
00041 {
00042         // Read data type identifier
00043         gdh.SetFileTypeId(FileInput::ReadString8(fileStream));
00044 
00045         // Read file identifier
00046         gdh.SetFileId(FileInput::ReadString8(fileStream));
00047 
00048         // Read file creation time
00049         gdh.SetFileCreationTime(FileInput::ReadString16(fileStream));
00050 
00051         // Read locale
00052         gdh.SetLocale(FileInput::ReadString16(fileStream));
00053 
00054         // Read name value pairs
00055         u_int32_t paramCount = FileInput::ReadUInt32(fileStream);
00056         for (u_int32_t iparam = 0; iparam < paramCount; ++iparam)
00057         {
00058                 const void* mimeValue = 0;
00059                 std::wstring name = FileInput::ReadString16(fileStream);
00060                 int32_t mimeSize = FileInput::ReadBlob(fileStream,mimeValue);
00061                 std::wstring type = FileInput::ReadString16(fileStream);
00062                 ParameterNameValueType nvt(name,(void*)mimeValue, mimeSize, type);
00063                 // deleting a "const void*" generates a warning under gcc.
00064                 // cast to a "char*" to quiet it.
00065                 delete[] (char*)mimeValue;
00066                 gdh.AddNameValParam(nvt);
00067         }
00068 
00069         // Read number of generic data parent header
00070         u_int32_t numParents = FileInput::ReadUInt32(fileStream);
00071 
00072         // Read each parent header in turn - this needs to be recursive
00073         for (u_int32_t iparent = 0; iparent < numParents; ++iparent)
00074         {
00075                 GenericDataHeader parentGDH;
00076                 Read(parentGDH);
00077                 gdh.AddParent(parentGDH);
00078         }
00079 }
